Text: The Albertina is a museum in the Innere Stadt (First District) of Vienna, Austria.

<Text: Albertina:  It houses one of the largest and most important print rooms in the world with approximately 65,000 drawings and approximately 1 million old master prints, as well as more modern graphic works, photographs and architectural drawings.>
